short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View GitHub markdown files in a clean, distraction-free interface. Perfect for reading documentation and technical guides.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View GitHub markdown files in a clean, distraction-free interface. Perfect for reading documentation and technical guides.

MKView for GitHub transforms how you read markdown files on GitHub. With a single click, view any markdown file in a clean, beautiful interface optimized for reading.

Features:
• Clean, distraction-free reading experience
• Syntax highlighting for code blocks
• Interactive Mermaid diagram support
• Automatic dark mode support
• Fast and lightweight

Perfect for:
• Sharing a standalone README link
• Reading documentation
• Studying code examples
• Following tutorials
• Reviewing technical guides
• Presenting project information

How to use:
1. Navigate to any markdown file on GitHub
2. Click the MKView icon
3. Enjoy your content in a clean interface

The extension is powered by mkview.tech, ensuring consistent and reliable rendering.

Privacy & Security:
• No data collection
• No tracking
• Open source
• Requires minimal permissions

 Privacy Policy
This extension does not collect, store, or transmit any user data.
